sentences.sentence: Transform an arbitrary REST result into a generic ontological individual.
sentences.translation: 将任意的REST结果转换成一般的本体个体。

sentences.sentence: In the fourth Way, Aquinas offers a version of the Ontological Argument (see Anselm).
sentences.translation: 在第四种证明中，阿奎那提出了一种新版本的本体论证明（参见安瑟姆的观点），侧重于展示事物不同的品质。

sentences.sentence: There's no ontological subordination of the objects properties to the object itself.
